snippet: Rubain Dorancy and Jesse Hamilton, running for a vacancy created when Eric Adams became borough president, hope to increase affordable housing, keep hospitals open and improve schools.
abstract: Lawyers Rubain Dorancy and Jesse Hamilton are running for State Senate seat in Brooklyn vacated by Eric Adams when he became borough president; both Democratic candidates hope to increase affordable housing, keep hospitals open and improve schools.
lead_paragraph: Rubain Dorancy and Jesse Hamilton, running for a vacancy created when Eric Adams became borough president, hope to increase affordable housing, keep hospitals open and improve schools.

headline.main: 2 Lawyers Are Seeking Senate Seat in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: 2 Lawyers Are Seeking Senate Seat in Brooklyn
